description.value:
You can see ghosts and spirits that others just don’t sense. They’re constantly whispering unsettling secrets in your ear - when they’re not trying to kill you.

Benefit:

Drawback: If any sapient creatures have died nearby within 24 hours, you gain a double bane on the power roll if any of the creatures were hostile to you, or a double edge if they were friendly to you. You can’t use this ability again until have earned at least 1 Victory.
